Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change between LaSalle and UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to medical emergency at UIC-Halsted; board all trains on the O'Hare-bound side at UIC-Halsted, Clinton & LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service is running with delays due to a medical emergency near UIC-Halsted.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between LaSalle and UIC-Halsted station.

Board/exit all trains on the O'Hare-bound side of the platform at UIC-Halsted, Clinton & LaSalle.

Shuttle buses are available between Jackson and Racine to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#60 Blue Island/26th

#126 Jackson

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
